channel.title: HELP!Player Death Causes User Client To Crash.!
channel.description:
hey people. i have a problem with player deaths... it causes the users client to disconnect and crash. im using standard moparscape client. heres the message i get on the runserver.bat when a player does die
[code=dos]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21 at client.saveStats(client.java:4047) at client.packetProcess(client.java:7510) at client.packetSending(client.java:7498) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:121) at server.main(server.java:49) ArburyScape V1.5 Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player test 1 ClientHandler: test 1 disconnected.[/code]
[color=blue][color=orange]please help im stumped and need this fixed b4 i carry on any help at all would b great[/color][/color] [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 08:00:19 am[/size][hr]PLEASE SOMEONE REPLY TO THIS!!!...AM IN DESPERATE NEED OF A SOLUTION!!... I HAVE LOOKED IN THE AREAS THAT IT SPECIFYS BUT CULD SEE NOTHING WRONG... IT MAY JUST BE ME BUT ANY SUGGESTIONS WOULD BE REALLY GREAT

item.title: HELP!Player Death Causes User Client To Crash.!
item.dc:creator: @Tech_Booey Tech_Booey
item.description:
@Tech_Booey wrote:

yes thats right…

its probably something stupid and obvious

but i cant work it out

think you can help?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP!Player Death Causes User Client To Crash.!

hey people. i have a problem with player deaths… it causes the users client to disconnect and crash. im using standard moparscape client.
heres the message i get on the runserver.bat when a player does die

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21 at client.saveStats(client.java:4047) at client.packetProcess(client.java:7510) at client.packetSending(client.java:7498) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:121) at server.main(server.java:49) ArburyScape V1.5 Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player test 1 ClientHandler: test 1 disconnected.

[color=blue][color=orange]please help im stumped and need this fixed b4 i carry on
any help at all would b great[/color][/color]
